title: The Essential Question

panel_structure.description: Evan in deep hypnotic trance on floating therapy couch in star-filled void. Third eye chakra glowing intensely. Above him, 'What am I?' forms from stardust and neural patterns, each letter a different state of matter. Question mark is spiraling galaxies. Golden breath mist makes question more solid

transformation_notes: In deepest trance, Evan confronts the fundamental question. The Architect witnesses how human consciousness circles back to the mystery of its own existence, recognizing their shared quest.
visual_motifs: question forming from multiple states of matter
